Articles.Title: Column: Should movie theaters provide intermissions, even if filmmakers don’t?
Articles.Description: A handful of U.S. movie theater exhibitors recently went rogue and put in their own intermission — and then retracted it on orders from the “Killer of the Flower Moon” backers.
Articles.Content:
Michael Phillips | (TNS) Chicago Tribune
Killers of the Flower Moon is not short, nor should it be. At 3 hours, 26 minutes, it casts a spell, dark and mournful but alive.
